title: Mr.arihara's Secret Circumstances
alternative_title: Mr.Arihara’s Secret Circumstances ; Mr. Arihara’s Secret Circumstances ; Mr. Arihara's Secret Circumstances ; Arihara-san no Himitsu no Jijou ; 有原さんの秘密の事情
status: Mr.Arihara’s Secret Circumstances ; Mr. Arihara’s Secret Circumstances ; Mr. Arihara's Secret Circumstances ; Arihara-san no Himitsu no Jijou ; 有原さんの秘密の事情
description:
Description :
        Arihara Keigo – he excels in any role he plays, and he has a few awards under his acting. Arihara meets Matsushita, an idol and his co-star who struggles with acting. One day, Matsushita mistakes the dressing room and discovers Arihara’s secret. The “aloof and mysterious” Arihara that everyone loves is actually a clutz with a sweet tooth! As the two become friends, Matsushita becomes interested in Arihara’s real personality…!?

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 4: We Won T Give Up
